string-array.name: notifications_des
string-array.item: 你将忽略关于此主题的所有通知。
只有他人 @name 提及了你或回复了你的帖子时，你才会收到相关通知。
因为你阅读了此主题，所以你将收到相关通知。
因为你在关注此主题，所以你将收到相关通知。

string-array.name: notifications_des1
string-array.item: you will not be notified of anything about this topic, and it will not appear on your unread tab.
you will be notified only if someone mentions your @name or replies to your post.
you will be notified of @name mentions and replies to your posts, plus you will see a count of unread and new posts.
same as Tracking, plus you will be notified of all new posts.
